title: Pukahontas
description: His name is Barney Gumble. He’s forty, he’s single, and he drinks. It’s brilliant! Savagely honest. Tender. He has the soul of a poet. Grand prize winner at the Springfield Film Festival.
quote: Don’t cry for me, I’m already dead.
altHero: arthouse style shot of Barney drinking a beer as wind blows through sheer curtains
alt1: aerial shot of Barney passed out on the couch, the curtains fluttering gracefully
alt2: Barney laying in the street drinking a beer
alt3: a dropped beer bottle pours into a sewer grate
alt4: an open window and a flower in a beer bottle loses its petals
